name: Me, You, B&Q
description:
you play as Tempie, a christmas temp at your local B&Q (a DIY store). find love and earn minimum wage!

short game - takes like 10 minutes to play. 

i made this completely as a joke, in a day, on a whim. its not supposed to be polished or finished or legit or anything: it's laughs. i am not affiliated with B&Q and i do not own any of the photographs used. i did the drawings and wrote half of it: thats it. idea (and some writing) from itsandrewnow . i am kit rees find me at kitrees.com or on most social medias as labradollars
